name: A Tail of Dice
description:
minimalist puzzle game inspired by fidel & the witness.

controls:
ENTER to start (click the viewport in case keys don't work, or just go full screen)
Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
Undo: Z
Reset: R

code & programmer art by leddoo
cover art by Vanessa Mai
repo: https://github.com/leddoo/jam-gmtk-2022

PS: you can skip levels with F1/F2
Undo is Y on QWERTZ keyboards
